item.title: Default Scrape Headers
item.description: Basically just copy these headers into any project where you’re making web requests from the command line. It’s a good place to start.
item.dc:creator: shaenr

item.title: Another Place to Write and Not Write
item.description: I have a tendency to encapsulate myself on the Internet behind multiple names, accounts, email addresses, and identities. I wouldn’t say I always put an unnecessary amount of effort into keeping them apart. But the multiple aspects thing has always been …
item.dc:creator: shaenr
